mapper.select: SELECT ro, no, title, hit, reg_date "date", group_no "groupNo", order_no "orderNo", depth, del, user_no "userNo", name FROM (SELECT ROWNUM ro, no, title, hit, reg_date, group_no, order_no, depth, del, user_no, name FROM (SELECT r.no no, r.title title, r.hit hit, to_char(r.reg_date,'yy-mm-dd hh24:mi') reg_date, r.group_no group_no, r.order_no order_no, r.depth depth, r.del del, r.user_no user_no, u.name name From replyboard r left outer join users u on r.user_no = u.no order by no desc) where title like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' and ROWNUM <= #{end}) where ro >= #{start}
SELECT count(no) no FROM replyboard WHERE title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT r.no no, u.name name, r.hit hit, to_char(r.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') "date", r.title title, r.content content, r.user_no "userNo", r.del del FROM replyboard r left outer join users u ON r.user_no = u.no WHERE r.no = #{no}
